events.title: Pancake With Sliced Strawberry
events.brief: A pancake (or hotcake, griddlecake, or flapjack) is a flat cake, often thin and round, prepared from a starch-based batter that may contain eggs, milk and butter.

events.title: Casual Run 2020
events.brief: A casual run organised by Standard Chartered to create awarenes arounfd inclusivity. Join us for specially crafted routes to ensure people of all ages and abilities can enjoy.

events.title: Museum Visit: Portraits
events.brief: Singapore Arts Museum is having a temporary collection of portraits showcasing local heroes and their stories on how they played a part in shaping SIngapore today.
